attributes.action: encourage UK industry by trying to ensure that all the UK defence budget  is protected.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ensuring that the UK defence budget is spent within the UK or on equipment manufactured within the UK ensures the development of both heavy industry and hi tech companies. Foreign designed equipment could be purchased but it should be built within the UK. For example, faulty bullets were purchased from abroad endangering UK troops; whilst it is also meant that a factory in the UK may close down.
